title: NPST delivers stellar performance in FY 2024,  posts 216% growth in YoY revenue
description: NPST excelled in FY 2024 with a 216% surge in annual revenue and a 310% net profit increase. The company secured orders for innovative solutions and plans to focus on AI/ML technologies for future growth in digital payments.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
